website_summaries.verdict: Pretty cream and sugar set from higher-end, French cookware manufacturer, which can be added on to collection.
pros: Attractively styled, high-fired stoneware with glossy, non-porous enamel finish
Resists odors, staining, chipping, and cracking
Dishwasher-safe, and comes in 9 vibrant color options
Can be added to other kitchen accessories in this collection from Le Creuset
cons: A few complaints about the loose fit of sugar bowl lid

customer_reviews.title: O disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine today, and I'm sending it back. The lid was too small and didn't cover the opening. Rattled around. I was replacing my former one that my husband broke the little knob off the lid. They changed the design of the set, the bowl no longer has handles, or a spoon. I've collected many of these and I've seen a decline in the way things are being made. I'm really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: It's a quality set. You can certainly find cheaper alternatives, but if you don't mind paying extra for the brand name, you should be happy with this set.
customer_reviews.author: ADAM LEE

customer_reviews.title: Nice color but very tiny
customer_reviews.text: The product came looking much like the picture. I order the red and it was very close in color. It was much smaller than I expected. Had to return because it was going to hold for what I needed it for. Great brand but very pricy and too small.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ali

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sized cream and sugar set.
customer_reviews.text: I knew I liked the color of this set as I collect the Le Creuset Cherry items, but I absolutely love the size of this set. They are on the smaller side, but it's just my husband and I that drink coffee, so no need for a quart of sugar on the table. The lid nicely sits on the sugar dish and there isn't a slot for a spoon, which I like because I wouldn't want ants to be able to get in. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C Sandberg

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream and is much classier to pour from ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this creamer because I wanted a small vessel to buzz coffee creamer into a froth with my Aerolatte battery-operated whisk. Works like a dream and is much classier to pour from than a regular glass. The salt crock was a nice replacement for my older, busted bamboo one (I need a covered salt crock b/c I have pet fur in my life). Beautiful, microwaveable & dish washer safe.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Corkins

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Present
customer_reviews.text: This was for a birthday present for my niece. She told me she really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. The quality is great and they look awesome. If you are looking for a set like this and the color matches or even if it does not. Buy these and feel safe about your purchase. I mix and match my colors. These do not match my dishes but accentuate their colors.
customer_reviews.author: Averagejoe

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product. Ample Volume.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, great quality, looks amazing in my kitchen. The sugar bowl holds more than my last, which had been plenty. The creamer doesn't dribble like some.
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I received the sugar and creamer set today. The quality is good and the color matches my other pieces perfect. My family drinks a lot of coffee so they will be used everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Rose0010

customer_reviews.title: Quality plus function
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased the Le Creuset creamer and sugar bowl set it was to go with a new dinnerware set. The colors are vibrant and coordinate and complete the table setting perfectly. I'm looking forward to setting the Thanksgiving table this year!
customer_reviews.author: Aphrodite43

customer_reviews.title: Not on par with the quality of Le Creuset cookware ...
customer_reviews.text: Not on par with the quality of Le Creuset cookware, but attractive and decently made (in China) cream and sugar set.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful. Perfect accent for our new kitchen. Looks great sitting at our coffee bar.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Mihalko

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived as described and in the time frame listed.
customer_reviews.author: Jean W.

customer_reviews.title: Love this...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter broke my sugar bowl and I love this one. It matches my other cherry le creuset. I plan on buying more from the same set.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J. Maya

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was extremely quick and the item was just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: le Creuset cream and sugar set is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with set. Will match all my red Le Creuset mugs. Quality is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Margo Darzano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I love all of my Le Creuset kitchenware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pricey but was the right style and color
customer_reviews.text: Heavy weight, nice color and quality. I guess I paid for the Le Creuset name.. It was what they asked for...
customer_reviews.author: Siobhan Sorak

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have a friend who collects this cherry red. Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: So pretty and the size was just as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: trulane wilmore

customer_reviews.title: High quality stoneware, no issues at all
customer_reviews.text: What you see is what you get. If you're familiar with Le Creuset, you already know about their reputation. These pieces aren't any different. Top notch construction, glazing, etc. If you're ok with the dimensions and color, you can't really go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: mbrennan

customer_reviews.title: Le Creuset...very well made!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nicely made Cream and Sugar set. I like that both the pieces are straight sided. Easy to clean and, as for the sugar, not as inclined to clump up. It really is a nice addition to our dinner set.
customer_reviews.author: RIArtist

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Addicted to Le Creuset; these are little beauties! A tad pricey.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBuys

customer_reviews.title: Knock  off!!
customer_reviews.text: These products are not made in France they're made in China save your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely......
customer_reviews.text: This product is better looking in person than in the pictures. The size of the creamer and sugar bowl..... perfect. The color (cherry red) is a great match to my other Le Creuset items. I am very happy with my purchase. 5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn in CA

product_meta.title: Le Creuset Stoneware Cream and Sugar Set, 2-Piece, Cerise
product_meta.description: Color:CeriseThis pair of conveniently sized stoneware containers is the perfect compliment to coffee and tea, with a precision-pour spout for serving cream and a tight-fitting lid for storing sugar
feature_bullets: Non-porous enamel finish; resists odors, staining, chipping, and cracking
Made of durable, high-fired stoneware with glossy enamel glazing
Dishwasher-safe; matches other le creuset stoneware; lifetime warranty

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars136 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
